items.title: Art Director
items.content: We have two awesome art directors working with us, who can provide specialized and high-qualified guidance for any artistic project that you can imagine. We count on them to lead your art for a higher level.

items.title: Character Design
items.content: Any good game and story relies upon good characters. And to create the better ones, we have experienced and high-qualified Concept Artists, who are capable of creating the greater characters to your universe.

items.title: Environment
items.content: Alongside with the characters, the environment gives a beating heart and consistent background to every artwork. Thinking about it, we wish to provide you beautiful scenarios and wonderful landscapes.

items.title: Prop Design
items.content: The props are all over any game, and sometimes have great highlights on them, like legendary weapons or armors. In any way, let us come up with the greater items and props for your project.

items.title: Concept Art
items.content: The very primal and essential step in the development of any IP, concept art is the work that gives soul and identity to the project, and thatâ€™s why we give real value to it, always looking to bring to life the most beautiful and creative stuff that your mind can conceive.

items.title: Illustration
items.content: If the concept art is what gives life to an idea, the illustrations, in all forms, are what shows it to the world. To create a Strong connection, a real bond, between creator and public, such is the power of a good illustration, and such is our goal when working on one.
